snippet: But Evenflo is refusing to recall rear-facing infant seats that use the same buckle.
abstract: Evenflo Company is recalling almost 1.4 million child restraints due to flaw in buckle that could make it hard to free child in emergency, but is refusing to recall rear-facing infant seats that use same buckle; refusal echoes similar decision by Graco Children's Products; both companies say buckle design is unimportant because infant seats have a quick release that is not impacted by buckle.
lead_paragraph: But Evenflo is refusing to recall rear-facing infant seats that use the same buckle.

headline.main: Second Maker of Car Seats Cites Buckle Flaw in Recall
headline.print_headline: 2nd Car Seat Maker Cites Buckle Flaw in a Recall
